mapper.insert: INSERT INTO globalbiz.CenterLeads (leadYMD, contactFstName, contactLstName, contactEmail, partnerFstName, partnerLstName, partnerEmail, phone, cellPhone, city, stateCD, zip, addr, country, howHear, howHearMore, areaInterested, notes, statusCD, lastContactYMD, jisaCD, regDate, regID, updID) VALUES (#{leadYMD}, #{contactFstName}, #{contactLstName}, #{contactEmail}, #{partnerFstName}, #{partnerLstName}, #{partnerEmail}, #{phone}, #{cellPhone}, #{city}, #{stateCD}, #{zip}, #{addr}, #{country}, #{howHear}, #{howHearMore}, #{areaInterested}, #{notes}, #{statusCD}, #{lastContactYMD}, #{jisaCD}, NOW(), #{regID}, '')
mapper.select: SELECT a.idx, DATE_FORMAT(a.leadYMD, '%m/%d/%Y') AS leadYMD, a.contactFstName, a.contactLstName, a.contactEmail, a.partnerFstName, a.partnerLstName, a.partnerEmail, a.phone, a.cellPhone, a.city, a.stateCD, IFNULL(b.stateName, '') AS stateName, a.zip, a.addr, a.country, a.howHear, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(a.jisaCD, '0321', a.howHear, '', 'Y') AS howHearName, a.howHearMore, a.areaInterested, a.notes, a.statusCD, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM('08', '0320', a.statusCD, '', 'Y') AS statusName, DATE_FORMAT(a.lastContactYMD, '%m/%d/%Y') AS lastContactYMD, a.jisaCD, a.regDate, a.regID, a.updDate, a.updID FROM globalbiz.CenterLeads AS a LEFT JOIN globalbiz.StateInfo AS b ON a.stateCD = b.stateCD WHERE idx = #{idx}
SELECT idx, clIdx, DATE_FORMAT(regDate, '%m/%d/%Y %h:%i %p') AS noteDate, notes, jisaCD, regDate, regID FROM globalbiz.CenterLeadsNote WHERE clIdx = #{idx} ORDER BY regDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO globalbiz.CenterLeadsNote (clIdx, noteDate, notes, jisaCD, regDate, regID) VALUES (#{clIdx}, #{noteDate}, #{notes}, #{jisaCD}, NOW(), #{regID})
mapper.update: UPDATE globalbiz.CenterLeads SET contactFstName = #{contactFstName}, contactLstName = #{contactLstName}, contactEmail = #{contactEmail}, partnerFstName = #{partnerFstName}, partnerLstName = #{partnerLstName}, partnerEmail = #{partnerEmail}, phone = #{phone}, cellPhone = #{cellPhone}, city = #{city}, stateCD = #{stateCD}, zip = #{zip}, addr = #{addr}, country = #{country}, howHear = #{howHear}, howHearMore = #{howHearMore}, areaInterested = #{areaInterested}, notes = #{notes}, statusCD = #{statusCD}, updDate = NOW(), updID = #{updID} WHERE idx = #{idx}
